Modal

Use a modal dialog to inform the user about unsaved changes when he leaves the page. A modal dialog alerts the user and requires interaction before the site can be used again.

Installation 

                  
                    npm i @govflanders/vl-ui-modal

or 

                  
                    yarn add @govflanders/vl-ui-modal

Usage

Import SASS 

                  
                  @import "vl-ui-modal/src/scss/modal";

Make sure your sass --include-path includes node_modules/@govflanders/.

Import JS

                  
                  import { Modal } from '@govflanders/vl-ui-modal';

Modal

The modal supports two size variants:

  • Add the .vl-modal-dialog--medium next to .vl-modal-dialog for a medium sized modal-dialog
  • Add the .vl-modal-dialog--large next to .vl-modal-dialog for a large sized modal-dialog

Modal 1

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.
Annuleer 
      
      
  
  <button class="vl-button"data-vl-modal-open="modal-1">
    Open
  </button>

      
  
  <div class="vl-modal">
    <dialog id="modal-1" class="vl-modal-dialog" data-vl-modal data-vl-modal-closable tabindex="-1" role="dialog" aria-modal="true" aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="modal-toggle-1-title" aria-describedby="modal-toggle-1-description"><button type="button" class="vl-modal-dialog__close" data-vl-modal-close>
        <i class="vl-modal-dialog__close__icon vl-vi vl-vi-cross" aria-hidden="true"></i>
        <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Venster sluiten</span>
      </button>
      <h2 class="vl-modal-dialog__title" id="modal-toggle-1-title">Modal 1</h2>
      <div class="vl-modal-dialog__content" id="modal-toggle-1-description">
          Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.
      </div>
      
      <div class="vl-action-group">
        <button class="vl-button">
    aanvraag starten
  </button>
        <a href="#" class="vl-link"data-vl-modal-close>
    <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--before vl-vi vl-vi-cross" aria-hidden="true" data-vl-modal-close></i>
      Annuleer
    </a>

      
  </div>
    </dialog>
  </div>

Modal (closing disabled)

By removing data-vl-modal-closable as an attribute, the user cannot close the modal by pressing 'esc' or by clicking outside the modal dialog.

Modal 2

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.
Annuleer 
      
      
  
  <button class="vl-button"data-vl-modal-open="modal-2">
    Open
  </button>

      
  
  <div class="vl-modal">
    <dialog id="modal-2" class="vl-modal-dialog" data-vl-modal tabindex="-1" role="dialog" aria-modal="true" aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="modal-toggle-2-title" aria-describedby="modal-toggle-2-description">
      <h2 class="vl-modal-dialog__title" id="modal-toggle-2-title">Modal 2</h2>
      <div class="vl-modal-dialog__content" id="modal-toggle-2-description">
          Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.
      </div>
      
      <div class="vl-action-group">
        <button class="vl-button">
    aanvraag starten
  </button>
        <a href="#" class="vl-link"data-vl-modal-close>
    <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--before vl-vi vl-vi-cross" aria-hidden="true" data-vl-modal-close></i>
      Annuleer
    </a>

      
  </div>
    </dialog>
  </div>

Initialize

  • vl.modal.dressAll() loops over all modal dialogs in the DOM and initializes all modals that haven't been initialized yet. - vl.modal.dress(modal) initializes a single modal. Requires the root DOMelement of the modal as a parameter.

Public methods

  • vl.modal.toggle(modal) allows switching between the open/closed states of a modal. Requires the root DOMelement of the modal as a parameter.

Changelog

  • 3.2.0

    • Feature: Public method vl.modal.toggle() was added to allow switching between the open/closed states of a modal dynamically.
